name: TheFighters: NewBlood (DEMO)
description:
Indie Fighting game

for now, this is just a demo game.

HOW TO PLAY:

"WSAD"---------------------------------- Move

"K" or Left mouse click ---------------- Punch

"B" or Right mouse click ---------------- Block

"R + T" ------------------------------------- Special Move


for Xbox controller:

"Analog "---------------------------------- Move

"X" ------------------------ ---------------- Punch

"RT" ---------------------- ---------------- Block

"LT + Y" ------------------------------------- Special Move

and I will be happy to get your review
